hooks.command: python -c "import platform, os, random; sound=random.choice([r'.claude/sounds/dialogue_yes.wav', r'.claude/sounds/villager_select4.WAV', r'.claude/sounds/villager_train4.wav']); os.system(f'afplay {sound} 2>/dev/null &') if platform.system()=='Darwin' else __import__('winsound').PlaySound(sound, __import__('winsound').SND_FILENAME) if platform.system()=='Windows' else os.system(f'aplay -q {sound} 2>/dev/null &')"
